long_description: This book will teach you the skills that will take you to the top using detailed descriptions of the newest and most effective mountaineering tactics. Author: Craig Connally. Softcover; 376 pages; detailed climbing diagrams. Ragged Mountain Press/McGraw Hill Publishing; copyright 2005. Increase your skills and build your confidence on alpine rock, snow and ice. Learn to move light and fast on third-, fourth- and fifth-class terrain. Glean the practical skills of the world's leading alpinists.
short_description: This book will teach you the skills that will take you to the top using detailed descriptions of the newest and most effective mountaineering tactics.
